full_summary:
### Tender Notice: Grass Cutting and Grounds Maintenance at CFB North Bay

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4451999260-Doc4497975114
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4451999260
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Publication Date**: 2024-03-20
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-15T14:00:00 (Extended to: Please disregard the posted closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2024-04-15 at 14:00 EDT)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-04-30

#### Tender Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking offers from qualified contractors to provide grass cutting, trimming, and grounds maintenance services at Department of National Defence (DND), Canadian Forces Base (CFB), North Bay. The scope of work includes maintaining the main base (non-secure) and general restricted area (secure) as defined in the CFB North Bay Site Plan.

#### Background

This tendering activity is open to all qualified contractors. The tendering process involves a Request for Proposal (RFP) with a selection criterion based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is covered under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### Tender Description

The Government of Canada is seeking a qualified contractor to provide grass cutting and grounds maintenance services at CFB North Bay. The contractor will be responsible for ensuring the grounds are well-maintained and visually appealing.

**Contact Information**

* **Contact Name**: Jason Scott
* **Contact Email**: Jason.Scott@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL
